name: Room Pire
description:
The Room Pire world is filled with evil and only one room knows how to stop it. You are that room.

 Discover a world filled with everything I made during the jam, witch is inefficient code and questionable decisions...

The jam

The jam was a lot of fun and I hope you will like the game! There are still some bugs in the game, that I did't have time to fix, but overall it's pretty finished. This was my first time making a strategy game so feedback in the comments would be really helpful.
